name.description: Full legal name of the caregiver. This field is mandatory.

email.description: Primary email address of the caregiver. Must be a valid email format. This field is mandatory.

phone.description: Primary contact phone number for the caregiver. Should include area code.

address.description: Complete street address of the caregiver, including city, state, and ZIP code.

dateOfBirth.description: Caregiver's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format.

skills.description: List of skills, certifications, or qualifications the caregiver possesses (e.g., 'CPR Certified', 'Dementia Care Specialist', 'Fluent in Spanish').

yearsOfExperience.description: Total years of professional caregiving experience.

isActive.description: Indicates if the caregiver is currently active and available for assignments. Defaults to true.

availabilityType.description: Primary type of availability (e.g., live-in, hourly, respite care).

notes.description: Any additional notes about the caregiver, such as preferences or restrictions.
